name: Primitive Shields
desc: This ship carries an early branch of shield technology that never became widespread. These shields are very efficient but have a limited duration and must regularly recharge or go offline to reset.
short: Shields that can only be used for brief periods regardless of flux level.

name: Knight Refit
desc: This ship has been overhauled by the militant sect of the Luddic Church. Considered antiquated by some, these hulls were outfitted with extensive modular armor plates for protection, optimized primarily for ballistics, and equipped with primitive capacitor based shield emitters.
short: Ballistic weapons in composite slots increase flux stats. Speed increases when modules are lost.

name: Duskfall
desc: Strange devices of unknown origin, they appear to be highly energized.
short: Strange devices of unknown origin, they appear to be highly energized.
sprite: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/hullmods/zea_dusk_sparklethingy.png

name: Conformal Shield
desc: This ship uses a custom shield emitter configuration that mains its front shield in close proximity to the hull.
